title: Bhagyashree Makeover: phone + WhatsApp contact configuration

requirements.summary: Set the site-wide WhatsApp target number and ensure all WhatsApp CTAs open the correct wa.me link in a new tab without configuration alerts.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/config/whatsapp.ts` uses phone number `919226121208` (country code + number, no spaces) as the WhatsApp target.
Clicking the existing WhatsApp CTA button in the Hero section opens `https://wa.me/919226121208?...` in a new tab.
Clicking the existing WhatsApp CTA button in the Contact section opens `https://wa.me/919226121208?...` in a new tab.
No alert about WhatsApp not being configured is shown in normal usage.

file_operations.description: Configure `whatsappConfig.phoneNumber` to `919226121208` and keep the existing default prefilled message for wa.me link generation.

Adjust WhatsApp CTA click behavior to always open `https://wa.me/${whatsappConfig.phoneNumber}?text=...` in a new tab and avoid using an `alert()` for missing configuration (e.g., disable/no-op with non-blocking feedback), so normal usage never shows a configuration alert.

requirements.summary: Add a clickable phone number in the Contact section using a tel: link for calls.
acceptanceCriteria: The Contact section displays the phone number `9226121208` in the UI.
The phone number is a clickable link using `href="tel:+919226121208"` (or equivalent) and triggers the device dialer when clicked on supported devices.
User-facing text for the phone/contact area is in English.

file_operations.description: Add a phone contact row/card within the Contact section that displays `9226121208` in English and renders it as a clickable `tel:+919226121208` link (mobile/desktop compatible), keeping styling consistent with the existing layout.
